subject: Google Marketing campain
body:
New Special Offer from   
www.neomobile.us  
Sell Brand New Mobile Phones 

The phones are brand new (Euro specs.), sim free, unlocked, no 
operator
logo, come in their original sealed box with 2 years international
warranty from their manufacturer.
The package contains original manufacturer sealed box, full set with 
handset, original charger and battery, user manual, CD, full accessories. 


Special Offers :

10x Nokia 8800 Sirocco: 1580.00 EUR

10x Nokia 8800 : 1400.00 EUR 

10x Nokia N95: 1720.00 EUR 

10x Nokia N93: 1570.00 EUR 

10x Nokia N92: 1590.00 EUR 

20x Nokia N91: 1770.00 EUR 

20x Nokia N90: 1760.00 EUR

20x Nokia N80: 1970.00 EUR

10x Nokia N73: 1370.00 EUR

10x Nokia N70: 1300.00 EUR


For more info please visit our website :  www.neomobile.us  or contact us at
sales@neomobile.us
Also Don't forget to check the full special offers section   www.neomobile.us/specials.htm 
 


Address: 17 Theatre Walk The Headrow Centre, Leeds, West Yorkshire ,
LS1 6JE , United Kingdom 


Please make an order through our website  
http://www.neomobile.us/contactus.htm if you are interested to buy 
from our company.
